value.title: Using DAX to format a list of values in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Alberto Ferrari joins Patrick to walk through how you can use DAX to format a list of values within Power BI Desktop. This takes the concatenate values quick measure to the next level.  Original Quick Measure video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjSKCZtiNlI  Alberto's article - https://www.sqlbi.com/blog/alberto/2018/12/20/displaying-a-list-of-selected-months/
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/QYbl4k_CWBE" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Using different languages with the Power BI site
value.excerpt: I look at how your browser languages affect what is displayed. This all comes down to your browsers and the language settings within. Different browsers are configured differently. Fiddler can show you what your language order is.  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RqWyA9mD-Yk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: What are the main tools for Azure Synapse and SQL???
value.excerpt: Getting started with Azure Synapse Analytics or Azure SQL Database? Or even Microsoft SQL Server in general? Patrick shows you how to use some of the common tools and be able to connect to your instance!  Download SQL Server Management Studio https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/ssms/download-sql-server-management-studio-ssms

value.title: What Does Power BI Cost? (Including Power BI Report Server)
value.excerpt: What does Power BI cost? Adam has a lot of discussions around that. He will break down the Power BI cost and covers licenses, Power BI Premium and including Power BI Report Server and more! If you have ever asked yourself "What does Power BI cost?", this video is for you.  Power BI Pricing: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/pricing/

value.title: WHAT IF Power BI could dynamically highlight top or bottom values?

value.title: What the heck are BUILD PERMISSIONS in Power BI?!?
value.excerpt: Adam look at Power BI build permissions with shared datasets. Taking the mystery out of how you can interact with datasets and know what to do if you can't use it. This also looks at how Power BI free users can use shared datasets with Power BI Premium.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: What's up with the different JOINS in Azure SQL and Azure Synapse?

value.title: When optimizing Power BI don't forgot about CPU
value.excerpt: We talk about optimizations a LOT! We pile onto a question posed by Chris Webb - Should you optimize for CPU in Power BI? We think the answer is YES! Let's explain...
